name: X Car Racing - Top Fun Racing
name_original: X Car Racing - Top Fun Racing
description:
Download Now For FREE!!!

Get ready for the off-road experience of your life with x Racing! It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes offroad driving capabilities. This game will test your balance skills and reaction times beyond belief.
You must use all of your Racing and dodging skills to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,Fasten your seat belt, and let’s get running!


Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
- Different terrains/location
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- CRAZY jumps and loops
- Beautiful off-road terrains
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics
